PURPOSE:   a few purr functions 
  *



```{r setup, include=FALSE		}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
                      echo = TRUE,
                      eval=F,
                      include=F,
                      comment = "      ##",
                      error = TRUE,
                      collapse = T   ) # easier to read


```
```r
f  <- function(x) x + 2
g  <- function(x) x + 2
h  <- function(x) x + 2      # 6

purrr::compose(h,g,f)(0)
```
```r
0 %>%
  h %>%
  g %>%
  f            # 6
```
```r
k  <- purrr::partial(`+`, 2)
0 %>%
  k() %>%
  k() %>%
  k()         # 6
```

```r
quote(\(x) x^2)                 # function(x) x^2, call 
quote(\(x) x^2) %>% class()     # "call"
```
